The '''Pixel 9''' and '''Pixel 9 Pro''' are a pair of [[Android (operating system)|Android]] [[smartphone]]s designed, developed, and marketed by [[Google]] as part of the [[Google Pixel]] product line. They serve as the successor to the [[Pixel 8]] and [[Pixel 8 Pro]], respectively.

The Pixel 9 and Pixel 9 Pro was officially announced in late 2023 at the annual [[Made by Google]] event, and will be released in the United States<!--Do not add other countries, this is an American product--> in late 2023.

== History ==
In December 2023, ''[[The Information (website)|The Information]]'' reported that Google was planning to debut a new [[virtual assistant]] powered by its recently announced [[Gemini (language model)|Gemini]] [[large language model]], codenamed "Pixie", exclusively on the Pixel 9 and Pixel 9 Pro.<ref name="PixieInformation" /><ref name="PixieArs" />
